## Configuration in MegaLinter

| Variable                            | Description                                     | Default value |
|-------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------|---------------|
| ROBOTFRAMEWORK_PRE_COMMANDS         | List of bash commands to run before the linters | None          |
| ROBOTFRAMEWORK_POST_COMMANDS        | List of bash commands to run after the linters  | None          |
| ROBOTFRAMEWORK_FILTER_REGEX_INCLUDE | Custom regex including filter                   |               |
| ROBOTFRAMEWORK_FILTER_REGEX_EXCLUDE | Custom regex excluding filter                   |               |
